items.name: Blackberry Blanc Sour
items.desc:
Clean refreshing sour for any occasion. The blackberry and cherry fruit puree enhances the tart sour flavour and complements the underlying white wine grape flavour provided by the Hallertau Blanc hops.
There is something to love for the new to sour beer drinker as well as the drinker with a more sophisticated palette.
12x330ml Bottles.

items.name: Lazy Day Lager
items.desc:
We’ve brewed our Lazy Day Lager more times than any of our beers and there’s a reason, Lazy Day sums us up to a tee: easy-going, tasty and more than a little moreish.
Light and easy on the palate, with just enough crispness, you can enjoy Lazy Day with practically any food and is perfect for peaceful afternoons spent relaxing with good friends and great food.
12x330ml Bottles.

items.name: Mare St. Mosaic
items.desc:
Hackney is a mosaic of people, of culture and of life. We rejoice in this in our Mare St Mosaic, our hazy, tropical super smooth ale which is just perfect for everyday drinking.
You can’t make a great community without diversity, and you can’t get to Hackney Church Brew Co. without going down Mare Street.
12x330ml Bottles.

items.name: Mixed Case
items.desc:
Mare St. Mosaic - 3x330ml Bottles
Lazy Day Lager - 3x330ml Bottles
Blackberry Blanc Sour - 3x330ml Bottles
Superfly IPA - 3x330ml Bottles

items.name: Session with Ry IPA
items.desc:
Double dry hopped, full-bodied, session strength IPA. Big flavour and aroma of stone fruits with the backdrop of more fruits, earthy spiciness, and clean soft citrus flavour.
12x330ml Bottles.

items.name: Superfly IPA
items.desc:
This IPA pays tribute to our co-founder Reggie who sadly passed away in 2018. Known as “Superfly” in his youth thanks to his boundless energy and enthusiasm, our IPA celebrates his passion by just bursting with fresh, bright aromas. Fruity, crisp, tropical, you can barely taste the 6% alcohol and is equally great on its own as it is with cheeses, bread and red meat.
12x330ml Bottles.
